ProjectTitle: Biodiversa-SEPPI-Standardized European monitoring of plant-pollinator interactions
InitialFeedbackHistory: 14/02/2025 [REDACTED] used an older DMP template, please convert your DMP to the [REDACTED] standard DMP template, you can find this template in DMPonline.be or on the FWO website https://www.fwo.be/en/about-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan-dmp/. [REDACTED] recommend converting this at your earliest convenience and submitting as intermediate DMP, but please make sure that the final DMP that FWO will ask you to submit at the end of the project follows the new template [REDACTED] [REDACTED] use of dropbox or personal devices is not recommended by the ICTS, can you store all data on the KU [REDACTED] servers? Please consult the storage guide to find different solutions recommended by ICTS: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] please note that the minimum preservation time of 5 years is the FWO guideline, the KU [REDACTED] RDM policy requires a 10-year preservation period for all relevant data. [REDACTED] more details see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
label: good with suggestions
